page.title: 18DAILY LIFE
page.content: I wake up at 7.30 in the morning, have a wash, get dressed, have my breakfast, clean my teeth and get ready for school. The bell goes at ten to nine. We work at our lessons and our first break is at 10.40. Our dinner break is at twelve 0'clock then we go outside until 1.15. Our next break is at 2.25 then we go home at 3.30. We start school when we are 4 years old and carry on until we are 16 years old. Then you can either get a job or go to college. There are many different kinds of organisations to belong to including The Guides, The Cubs and The Brownies. Jobs are very scarce and a lot of people are out of work. The normal working day can be the eight 0'clock to five 0'clock. On Saturdays and Sundays people have the weekend off and families go out together.
